title: No. 6/5 Virginia Tech secures ACC series with 8-5 win over North Carolina - VT hokiesports.com
content: No. 6/5 Virginia Tech secures ACC series with 8-5 win over North Carolina  VT hokiesports.com
description: BLACKSBURG, Va. -- The No. 6/5 Hokies defeated North Carolina 8-5 Saturday afternoon, securing the ACC series for the third straight weekend. The Hokies improve to 8-0 and off to a 20-3 start, their best start since going 22-3-1 in 2015. Freshman Emma Lemley got the start and the win on Saturday, punching out nine North Carolina hitters over 5.1 innings of work to help power Tech over the Tar Heels.
